promo.shareLink: Share your referral link with friends!

chooseQuantity.title: XAI SENTRY KEY
chooseQuantity.description: Each Sentry Key enables you to submit up to 1 reward claim for each network challenge.

toolTip.title: Xai keys are required for nodes to receive $esXAI network rewards.
toolTip.text: Your wallet must be connected to Arbitrum One to be able to purchase Sentry Keys.

chooseQuantity.maximumNodeLicenses: A maximum of {{max}} NodeLicenses can be purchased in a single transaction.

pricesMayVary.title: Your transaction may be reverted
pricesMayVary.text: Xai Sentry Key prices vary depending on the quantity of remaining supply. In general, as the quantity of available keys decreases, the price of a key will increase. If you purchase more Keys than are available in the current pricing tier, the transaction may revert. We recommend splitting the purchase into two transactions - one for the current pricing tier and another in the next pricing tier.

agreementCheckboxes.notTransferableKeys: I understand Sentry Keys are not transferable
agreementCheckboxes.cannotRedeemXAI: I understand that I cannot redeem esXAI for XAI until I pass KYC

insufficientFundsError.title: Insufficient funds to complete transaction
insufficientFundsError.text: Make sure your wallet has enough AETH and gas to complete the transaction.
